Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Gallin (OvoDA, natural AMPs; chicken ovodefensin, UCSS1a;  3S=S, birds, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Recombinant peptide is active against E. coli BL21 (DE3) pLysS.Structure: 3 S-S bonds are C1-C5, C2-C4, and C3-C6.You can rotate, zoom, and view the 3D structureherein the PDB.Updated 11/2015, 4/2016; 9/2018.
Literature Information.Author: Gong D, Wilson PW, Bain MM, McDade K, Kalina J, Hervé-Grépinet V, Nys Y, Dunn IC.2010
Literature Information.Reference: BMC Immunol. 2010 Mar 12;11:12. (Gong D et al., 2010)
Literature Information.Title: Gallin; an antimicrobial peptide member of a new avian defensin family, the ovodefensins, has been subject to recent gene duplication
